items: 3/4 cup maple syrup (or honey or combination)
1/2 cup natural cane sugar (or brown sugar)

instructions: Combine dry ingredients, oats flour, baking soda, flax seeds, and walnuts in a bowl.
Over low heat, melt coconut oil, butter, maple syrup and sugar until dissolved.
Pour wet ingredients over dry and mix until moistened. Add beaten egg and mix until just combined. Do not overmix.
Divide mixture evenly among the 12 cups in the muffin pan, filling each one nearly to the top.
Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes until edges of oatcakes are golden brown
title: Oatcakes
